product_name: Francesco Rinaldi Traditional Pasta Sauce, No Salt Added,1.46 Pound (Pack of 3)
description:
Classic Tangy Pasta Sauce
Francesco Rinaldi Traditional Pasta Sauce is ideal for making quick meals. This sauce is made from ripe tomatoes with real cheese, which gives an authentic Italian taste to your meals. Moreover, no salt has been added in the recipe of this sauce so it is low in sodium and good for restricted diets.
Just For You: Italian cuisine lovers
Essential Elements: Francesco Rinaldi Traditional Pasta Sauce has tomato puree with a little lemon juice concentrate and imported pecorino Romano cheese that gives it a rich taste. Its selected spices and seasoning further accentuate the taste and aroma. 
Free of: Saturated fat and cholesterol
